locutie.beschrijving: The preacher uses the metaphor of a 'Stealth Bomber' to describe the hidden power of the Cross. Content includes NATO history, the nature of crucifixion as state execution, the reliability of biblical witnesses, and the paradox of God's 'alien work' (opus alienum).
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High. Strong integration of Pauline theology (1 Cor) and Johannine themes, with a focus on the 'shame' rather than just physical pain.

illocutie.beschrijving: The sermon primarily functions as an 'Apologetic Assertion' for the first two-thirds, shifting into 'Commissive/Promising' in the final movement.
voorbeelden: I determined to know nothing among you except Jesus Christ
The Cross is unique to Christianity
This action of God is not made known in a blaze of light

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: To instill trust in the biblical witness and provide comfort in the midst of perceived divine absence.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Implicit. Mentioned in the trinitarian completion of salvation at the end, but not as the active agent of the sermon's current reception.

voorbeelden: The Crucifixion of Christ was not a rogue action
God is on line wherever two or three are gathered
Let us seek to draw together
Listen to the words of the prophet
I have loved the Gospel of John all my life
I do not want any part of a religious fraud
We are joined to him in his promise of everlasting day
commissieven.kwaliteit: Strong but delayed. The 'Toezegging' (Promise) is concentrated in the final three paragraphs.

voorbeelden: Blessed are those who have eyes to see
declaratieven.autoriteit: Moderate. The preacher relies on quoting Jesus' declarations rather than speaking in the first-person persona Christi.

indicatoren: Talking 'about' the Cross as a category of history
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer becomes an observer of a historical/theological argument rather than a participant in a saving event.

missende_elementen: First-person commissives ('I promise you on behalf of Christ')
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Delayed encounter; the 'event' only happens in the final moments.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: High emotional resonance but low frequency.
voorbeelden: We are joined to him in his promise

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Personal testimony and academic experience ('I have been teaching...').

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Direct address to the 'you' who feels abandoned.
tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: High. Used to apply the gospel to the hearer's pain.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Describing God, Paul, the world, and the Cross.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Creates a lecture-like atmosphere for the majority of the text.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: The sermon moves from Assertive (The Cross as history) to Commissive (The Cross as promise for you).
voorbeelden: It was government-sanctioned... Good Friday is for you.
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: The transition is effective but late.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: Christ's completed work is accomplished... let no one make trouble for me.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon functions as a powerful defense of the faith that culminates in a tender promise of presence in suffering.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Martin Luther called this God's opus alienum: his alien work.
sterke_punten.effect: Provides a robust intellectual framework for suffering.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The entire first section on NATO and the Internet.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It becomes an event in the final third when the 'Stealth Bomber' metaphor lands in the hearer's personal darkness.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: Strong on 'Toezegging' (Promise), but lacks 'Declarative' (Directly enacting grace).

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: Implicit. The preacher speaks 'about' God's word.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Moderate. The preacher positions himself as a witness alongside Paul and John.
tekstueel_bewijs: We are reaffirming our trust in the Biblical witnesses

pneumatologie.geest_rol_erkend: Yes, in the final trinitarian formula.
pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: Implicitly left to the 'eyes to see and ears to hear'.
tekstueel_bewijs: in the power of the Holy Spirit, have completed the work of salvation

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: Yes, specifically in the 'Good Friday is for you' section.
sacramentstheologie.epifanisch_taalgebruik: Yes, the 'Stealth Bomber' metaphor serves as an epiphanic image.
tekstueel_bewijs: unveiling as it does the very nature of the God

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: Too many 'is/was' verbs in the first half. Needs more 'give/promise/forgive' verbs directed at the 'you'.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: The Cross reveals to us the power of God.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: In this Cross, God now breaks your reliance on worldly power.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Moves from a general truth (Assertive) to a present action (Declarative).

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The promise is buried at the end.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Interweave the 'for you' throughout the exegesis.
voorbeeldzinnen: This state-sponsored execution was for your justification.

adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Use the second person singular/plural to pierce the 'rubbernecking' distance.
voorbeeldzinnen: You are not just watching a drama; you are being saved by it.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The balance is actually quite good.
indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: Maintain the current flow but start the performative shift earlier.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterful theological meditation that successfully transitions from information to encounter, though it risks losing the hearer in the 'talking about' phase before the 'event' occurs.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SvT would focus on the preacher's 'Self-Revelation' (his 20 years of teaching); SAT focuses on the 'Commissives' (God's binding promise).
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: Rhetoric would praise the 'Stealth Bomber' metaphor for its cleverness; SAT evaluates if that metaphor actually 'delivers' God to the hearer.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT reveals that the sermon's power is not in the NATO illustration, but in the shift to the 2nd person 'is for you' at the end.

kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: The turning point of the sermon.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a classic example of 'Theological Homiletics' where the weight of the argument prepares the way for the sacramental moment.
